Ask your friends about this business
How would you rate this business?
105-6951 72 St , Delta , BC V4G 0A2
Get directions »
ModernWith a history spanning over 70-years, we at Modern Engineering Ltd. continue to build successful business relationships by exceeding our customers' expectations for machined components. As a fully automated CNC organization, our aim is to contribute to our customers' success by creating solutions and machining quality parts through collective team work and innovative manufacturing practices.We believe in delivering the highest quality machining solutions to our customers and we've put our money where our mouth is. Our capital reinvestment initiative has propelled Modern Engineering to be one of the first CNC machining companies in B.C. to invest in a FMS (Flexible Manufacturing System) structure, which utilizes the efficiencies of automation. Our intricate Zeiss Contura CNC Coordinate Measuring Machines will ensure that we meet and exceed the tightest tolerances that our customers demand.In addition to our state of the art machines, we have a state of the art team. Our highly skilled and talented team members take pride in their work to maintain the highest level of customer satisfaction without compromise with every project.Modern Engineering is dedicated to ISO 9001:2008 Quality Management System that supports our efforts in turning out unparalleled machined components on a consistent basis more...
